DOC.brief_summary: This double-blind RCT evaluate therapeutic effectiveness safety auricular acupuncture ( AA ) primary insomnia ( PI ) .
DOC.detailed_description: Investigators conduct 2-year clinical trial auricular acupuncture ( AA ) primary insomnia ( PI ) , double-blind ( patient-blind assessor-blind ) RCT . 288 patient randomly assign 2 group : treatment group ( Group A ) control group ( Group B ) . Group A treat AA plus oral Eszopiclone , Group B treat sham AA plus oral Eszopiclone . All patient receive continuous 4-week treatment 28-week follow-up . The data analyze third party clear allocation treatment .
